feed.title: Multilingua
feed.subtitle: A RSS feed containing the latest articles published in Multilingua

entry.title: “The team members were very tolerant”: social interactional ideologies and power in an intercultural context

entry.title: Joulu Kotona (Christmas at home): translocal multilingual practices in a Facebook music livestream during COVID-19

entry.title: Language management in semi-peripheral game production: how foreign workers in Czech video game studios experience the use of English, Czech, and other Slavic languages

entry.title: Requesting at work: exploring the intercultural style hypothesis of German-English bilinguals

entry.title: Bilingual autobiographical memory: unveiling the significance of memories encoded in multiple languages
